text: ālahi kezēna hulu melikamini፣ temesasayi፣ tedegagamī yeẖoneni mets’iḥāfi āwerede፡፡ ke’irisu (gišats’ē) ye’inezīya gētachewini yemīferuti sewochi k’odawochi yikomateralu፡፡ kezīyami k’odawochachewina libochachewi wede ālahi (tesifa) masitawesi yilezibalu፡፡ yihi ye’ālahi memirīya newi፡፡ be’irisu yemīshawini sewi yimerabetali፡፡ ālahimi yemīyat’emewi sewi le’irisu minimi āk’inyī yelewimi፡፡
